thread.title: CDs being released Oct. 16 - Music
thread.title_full: CDs being released Oct. 16 - Music - NorthJersey.com

author: The Record
title: CDs being released Oct. 16 - Music
text:
In stores Friday: 
Buy this photo — From news service reports DEMI LOVATO * Demi Lovato, "Confident" (Hollywood Island Records) — She co-wrote seven of the 11 tracks, two of which feature Iggy Azalea and Sirah.
* Coheed and Cambria, "The Color Before the Sun" (300 Entertainment) — The first non-conceptual album the band has released and the only one to not be a part of The Amory Wars storyline..
* Indie.Arie & Joe Sample, "Christmas With Friends" (Motown) — Some of those friends include: Tori Kelly, Brandy, Michael McDonald, KEM, Trombone Shorty and Dave Koz.
* Lisa Loeb, "Nursery Rhyme Parade!" (Furious Rose Production) — Features more than 30 familiar nursery rhymes and songs.
* The Brian Setzer Orchestra, "Rockin' Rudolph" (Surfdog) — The group's first Christmas album in 10 years.
— From news service reports
